question: 顔文字
sourceMnemonic: Remember how you learned that <ja>文字</ja> can mean "characters?" Well make a <kanji>face</kanji> out of those characters and you've made a <vocabulary>kaomoji</vocabulary>! <ja>ʅ(◔౪◔ ) ʃ</ja>
sourceReadingMnemonic: This word consists of the kun'yomi reading for <ja>顔</ja> added to the jukugo word <ja>文字</ja> that you already learned. You've learned these readings before, so reading this word should be nice and easy!
